org.lightningj.paywall.lightninghandler

Interface LightningHandlerContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LNDLightningHandlerContext

    public interface LightningHandlerContext
    Generic interface for the context of latest known state of a lightning handler after restart. Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-12-15.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static LightningHandlerContext parseContext(javax.json.JsonObject jsonObject)
      Factory method to parse lightning context json data into value objects.

    • Method Detail

      • parseContext

        static LightningHandlerContext parseContext(javax.json.JsonObject jsonObject)
                                     throws javax.json.JsonException
        Factory method to parse lightning context json data into value objects.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - the json data to parse. reades the type field from the object and creates an instance of the related object.
        Returns:
        a new LightningHandlerContext from the json data.
        Throws:
        javax.json.JsonException - if json data couldn't be parsed.
